TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TabAlignment extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the locations of the tabs in a tab control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by members such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> enumerations. To run the example, paste the following codein a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> called TabControl1. Call the ChangeTheLookOfTheTabControl method in the form's constructor or Load method.
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TabControlExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabControlExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TabControlExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabControlExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TabControlExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabControlExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment Bottom = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The tabs are located across the bottom of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment Left = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The tabs are located along the left edge of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment Right = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The tabs are located along the right edge of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment Top = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The tabs are located across the top of the control.
